title: Sudasuda Thooral Lyrics Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Sudasuda Thooral
Singers: Yuvan Shankar Raja
Music: Yuvan Shankar Raja
Lyrics: Yugabharathi
Movie: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
Other Songs Lyrics:

  • Oru Porambokku
  • Sudasuda Thooral
  • Dheivangal Ellam
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Sudasuda thooral
polivadhu neethaan
thoda thoda theeyaai
kulirvadhum neethaan
edhir paaraadha boogampam
neeyethaan
oh .. ennai naan kaanum
aarambam neeye thaan

Munirupadhum neethan
pinnirupadhum neethaan
enna solvadhu endhan
nenjile ullirupadhu neethaan

Sikka vaipadhum neethaan
sikkedupadhum neethaan
enna seivadhu ennai ipadi
kaththa vaipadhum neethaan
neethaan ,.

Ennidam ulla kettadhai nee vilakki
nalladhai yen koduthaai
dhevadhaiye naaney ennai
thorandhen adi
neeye unmai unardhen adi

Enna ninaithaalum sollividuveney
ippozhudhu yen thayangugiren
sollellaam neeyaagi ponaaye

Annaiyidam kooda ippadi oru
paasam kandadhillai naan en
ippozhudhu purigiradhey
vazhvellaam nee endru aanaaye

Eppavum unnai enniye kan urangi
ethanayo dhinangal aagiyadhey
poove un mun irundhen adi
aanaal indre vazhdhen adi

Unnai oru paadhi endru ninaikaamal
aththanaiyum neena ninaipadhiley
naalellaam theerndhaaley sandhosam

Thollai ena nee ennai ninaithaaley
nimmadhiyai nee pera thunai purindhu
saavai naan serndhaalum sandhosam

Sudasuda thooral
polivadhu neethaan
thoda thoda theeyaai
kulirvadhum neethaan
edhir paaraadha boogampam
neeyethaan
